summary.span: 表示一个程序集，它是一个可重用、无版本冲突并且可自我描述的公共语言运行时应用程序构建基块。

span.span: Represents an assembly, which is a reusable, versionable, and self-describing building block of a common language runtime application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类加载程序集，若要浏览的元数据和构成部分的程序集，以便发现的类型包含在程序集中，从而创建这些类型的实例。Use the class to load assemblies, to explore the metadata and constituent parts of assemblies, to discover the types contained in assemblies, and to create instances of those types. 若要获取的数组对象当前表示程序集加载到应用程序域 （例如，默认应用程序域的一个简单的项目），使用方法。To get an array of objects representing the assemblies currently loaded into an application domain (for example, the default application domain of a simple project), use the method. 动态，加载程序集类提供的以下静态方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法)。To load assemblies dynamically, the class provides the following static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic). 程序集是加载到加载操作的出现位置的应用程序域。Assemblies are loaded into the application domain where the load operation occurs. - 加载程序集的建议的方法是使用方法，它标识要按其显示名称加载的程序集 (例如，"System.Windows.Forms，Version = 2.0.0.0，区域性 = neutral，PublicKeyToken = b77a5c561934e089")。The recommended way to load assemblies is to use the method, which identifies the assembly to be loaded by its display name (for example, "System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"). 程序集搜索将遵循中所述的规则[运行时如何定位程序集](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)。The search for the assembly follows the rules described in [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md). - 和方法使你能够加载为反射，但不是为执行程序集。The and methods enable you to load an assembly for reflection, but not for execution. 例如，可以通过在 32 位平台运行的代码将检查面向 64 位平台程序集。For example, an assembly that targets a 64-bit platform can be examined by code that is running on a 32-bit platform. - 和方法为在其中必须由路径标识程序集的极少数情况下提供。The and methods are provided for rare scenarios in which an assembly must be identified by path. 若要获取对于当前正在执行的程序集，使用对象方法。To get an object for the currently executing assembly, use the method. 许多成员类提供有关程序集的信息。Many members of the class provide information about an assembly. 例如:For example: - 方法返回提供各部分的程序集显示名称的访问的对象。The method returns an object that provides access to the parts of the assembly display name. - 方法列出应用于程序集的特性。The method lists the attributes applied to the assembly. - 方法提供对程序集清单中的文件的访问。The method provides access to the files in the assembly manifest. - 方法提供的程序集清单中的资源的名称。The method provides the names of the resources in the assembly manifest. 方法列举程序集中的所有类型。The method lists all the types in the assembly. 方法列出对调用方的程序集外部可见的类型。The method lists the types that are visible to callers outside the assembly. 方法可以用于搜索的程序集中的特定类型。The method can be used to search for a particular type in the assembly. 方法可以用于搜索并在程序集中创建类型的实例。The method can be used to search for and create instances of types in the assembly. 程序集的详细信息，请参阅中的"应用程序域和程序集"部分[应用程序域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)主题。For more information on assemblies, see the "Application Domains and Assemblies" section in the [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前正在执行的程序集，创建包含该程序集中，类型的实例并调用与后期绑定的类型的方法之一。The following code example shows how to obtain the currently executing assembly, create an instance of a type contained in that assembly, and invoke one of the type's methods with late binding. 为此目的，下面的代码示例定义一个名为`Example`，使用一个名为方法`SampleMethod`。For this purpose, the code example defines a class named `Example`, with a method named `SampleMethod`. 类的构造函数接受一个整数，用于计算的方法的返回值。The constructor of the class accepts an integer, which is used to compute the return value of the method. 代码示例还演示了利用方法来获取可以用于分析的程序集的完整名称的对象。The code example also demonstrates the use of the method to obtain an object that can be used to parse the full name of the assembly. 该示例显示的程序集的版本号属性，与属性。The example displays the version number of the assembly, the property, and the property. [!code-cpp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的清单包含已加载文件的绝对路径，请使用属性改为。To get the absolute path to the loaded manifest-containing file, use the property instead. 如果程序集被加载作为字节数组，使用的重载采用的字节数组的方法，此属性返回的方法，而不加载的程序集的位置的调用方的位置。If the assembly was loaded as a byte array, using an overload of the method that takes an array of bytes, this property returns the location of the caller of the method, not the location of the loaded assembly. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性。The following example uses the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果运行时找不到`typeName`中实例，它将返回`null`而不是引发异常。If the runtime is unable to find `typeName` in the instance, it returns `null` instead of throwing an exception. 这可能是因为：This might happen because: - 你还没有指定类型的完全限定的名称。You haven't specified the fully qualified name of the type. - 你指定的完全限定的类型名称，但其大小写不匹配的类型的大小写属性。You've specified the fully qualified type name, but its case doesn’t match the case of the type's property. 有关不区分大小写的比较`typeName`使用该类型的全名，调用重载并指定`true`为`ignoreCase`自变量。For a case-insensitive comparison of `typeName` with the type's full name, call the overload and specify `true` for the `ignoreCase` argument. - 类型不存在于当前实例。The type doesn’t exist in the current instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Person`类和调用其进行实例化的方法。The following example defines a `Person` class and calls the method to instantiate it. summary.span: 返回方法（该方法调用当前正在执行的方法）的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法的调用方法是内联展开的由实时 (JIT) 编译器，或者如果其调用方是内联展开的该程序集，则返回可能会发生异常。If the method that calls the method is expanded inline by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler, or if its caller is expanded inline, the assembly that is returned by may differ unexpectedly. 例如，考虑以下方法和程序集：For example, consider the following methods and assemblies: - 方法`M1`集中`A1`调用。Method `M1` in assembly `A1` calls . - 方法`M2`集中`A2`调用`M1`。Method `M2` in assembly `A2` calls `M1`. - 方法`M3`集中`A3`调用`M2`。Method `M3` in assembly `A3` calls `M2`. 当`M1`不是内联，返回`A2`。When `M1` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 当`M1`是内联，返回`A3`。When `M1` is inlined, returns `A3`. 同样，当`M2`不是内联，返回`A2`。Similarly, when `M2` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 当`M2`是内联，返回`A3`。When `M2` is inlined, returns `A3`. 这种效果也会发生时`M1`作为尾调用从执行`M2`，或当`M2`作为尾调用从执行`M3`。This effect also occurs when `M1` executes as a tail call from `M2`, or when `M2` executes as a tail call from `M3`. 你可以阻止从 JIT 编译器内联调用的方法，通过应用特性与标志，但没有任何类似机制来防止尾调用。You can prevent the JIT compiler from inlining the method that calls , by applying the attribute with the flag, but there is no similar mechanism for preventing tail calls. ## Examples 下面的示例获取当前方法的调用程序集。The following example gets the calling assembly of the current method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/getcallingassembly1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/getcallingassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/getcallingassembly1.vb#4)]

## Remarks 此方法实现相应接口方法。This method implements the corresponding interface method. 因此，`inherit`必须指定参数，即使它将被忽略。Therefore, the `inherit` parameter must be specified even though it is ignored. 伪属性指示该属性为存在时必须设置的核心元数据位。A pseudo-attribute indicates bits of the core metadata that must be set when the attribute is present. 不同于扩展类型的元数据并保存与类型的自定义属性，一个伪属性修改类型的元数据，并则将被丢弃。Unlike a custom attribute that extends the metadata for a type and is saved along with the type, a pseudo-attribute modifies the metadata for the type and then is discarded. 无法使用现有的反射 Api 访问某些生成的数据位。Some of the resulting bits cannot be accessed using existing reflection APIs. 下表总结了不同的伪属性和可用于反射的位的访问。The following table summarizes the different pseudo-attributes and the accessors for the bits that are available in reflection. |伪属性Pseudo-Attribute|元数据位Metadata Bits|反射访问器Reflection Accessor| |-----------------------|-------------------|-------------------------| |SubDllImportAttribute|CorPInvokeMapCorPInvokeMap

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以返回`null`托管程序集已从非托管应用程序加载。The method can return `null` when a managed assembly has been loaded from an unmanaged application. 例如，如果非托管应用程序创建的编写 C# 中，调用的 COM 组件实例从 C# 组件的方法将返回 null，因为该过程的入口点非托管的代码而不是托管程序集。For example, if an unmanaged application creates an instance of a COM component written in C#, a call to the method from the C# component returns null, because the entry point for the process was unmanaged code rather than a managed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于性能原因，你应仅当你不知道在设计时当前正在执行哪些程序集时才调用此方法。For performance reasons, you should call this method only when you do not know at design time what assembly is currently executing. 检索的建议的方法对象，表示当前程序集是使用如下面的示例所示，在程序集中，找到的一种类型的属性。The recommended way to retrieve an object that represents the current assembly is to use the property of a type found in the assembly, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.getexecutingassembly/cs/assembly1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.getexecutingassembly/vb/assembly1.vb#1)] 若要获取包含调用当前正在执行代码的方法的程序集，请使用。To get the assembly that contains the method that called the currently executing code, use . ## Examples 下面的示例使用要获取当前正在执行的程序集属性基于该程序集中所包含的类型。The following example uses the property to get the currently executing assembly based on a type contained in that assembly. 它还会调用方法来显示它返回表示相同的程序集的对象。It also calls the method to show that it returns an object that represents the same assembly. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅搜索当前程序集实例。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`参数包含命名空间而不是程序集。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜索的一种类型的其他程序集，请使用方法重载，它可以选择性地包含程序集显示名称作为类型名称的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果类型已被转发给另一个程序集，它仍将返回此方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个抽象`MeansOfTransportation`类`Transportation`命名空间。The following example defines an abstract `MeansOfTransportation` class in the `Transportation` namespace. 它调用方法来检索其对象、 调用方法以获取数组的对象，表示该类型的属性，然后将信息显示在该类型的抽象属性。It calls the method to retrieve its object, calls the method to get an array of objects that represent the type's properties, and then displays information on the type's abstract properties. 请注意，调用方法使用该类型的完全限定的名称 （即，其类型名称以及其命名空间）。Note that the call to the method uses the type's fully qualified name (that is, its namespace along with its type name). [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.gettype/cs/gettype1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.gettype/vb/gettype1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅搜索当前程序集实例。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`参数包含命名空间而不是程序集。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜索的一种类型的其他程序集，请使用方法重载，它可以选择性地包含程序集显示名称作为类型名称的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果类型已被转发给另一个程序集，它仍将返回此方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). `throwOnError`参数仅影响找不到类型时，会发生什么情况。The `throwOnError` parameter only affects what happens when the type is not found. 它不会影响任何其他可能引发的异常。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 具体而言，如果找到的类型，但不能加载，可以引发即使`throwOnError`是`false`。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的数组包含嵌套的类型。The returned array includes nested types. 如果对程序集和类型调用方法，该程序集中依赖于尚未加载 （例如，如果它派生于第二个程序集中的类型），程序集中的类型引发。If the method is called on an assembly and a type in that assembly is dependent on a type in an assembly that has not been loaded (for example, if it derives from a type in the second assembly), a is thrown. 例如，可能的原因是第一个程序集被加载与或方法和第二个程序集未加载。For example, this can happen if the first assembly was loaded with the or methods, and the second assembly was not loaded. 它也可能会导致与使用加载的程序集和方法如果第二个程序集不能定位时调用方法。It can also happen with assemblies loaded using the and methods if the second assembly cannot be located when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 如果类型已被转发给另一个程序集，它不是包括在返回的数组。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 类型转发的信息，请参阅[公共语言运行时中的类型转发](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 若要检索的集合对象而不是数组的对象，请使用属性。To retrieve a collection of objects instead of an array of objects, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示在指定的程序集中的类型上的一种方法的参数。The following example displays parameters of one method on a type in the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加载程序集的信任级别操作调用程序集的信任级别相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要从应用程序域的信任级别的字节数组加载程序集，使用方法重载。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 有关使用的具有重载的证据的详细信息方法采用字节数组，请参阅方法重载。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由 c + + 编译器去除的重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`c + + 可执行文件的地址，指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 请注意此方法重载始终创建一个新具有其自己的映射对象。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称和匹配的简单名称的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序将无法继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用并且仅带有属性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供任何元素 （如名称或版本） 的程序集标识，因此加载不会发生根据负载通过标识规则，如你所料从方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反，使用负载从规则加载的程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 有关使用加载源上下文的缺点的信息，请参阅方法重载或[用于程序集加载的最佳实践](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则与加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换合并参数，证据。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法重载`Byte[]`从调用的程序集继承参数，以加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，而无需 SP1 中，如果你使用的版本 1.1 中方法重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`从调用程序集，继承和`Hash`和`StrongName`摘自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由 c + + 编译器去除的重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`c + + 可执行文件的地址，指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，在首次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，返回为属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果未找到该文件，用于搜索程序集。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例实例化对象并使用它来加载`sysglobal.dll`程序集。The following example instantiates an object and uses it to load the `sysglobal.dll` assembly. 此示例然后显示程序集的公共类型的完整名称。The example then displays the full name of the assembly's public types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集名称的长格式由其 （如"系统"System.dll 程序集） 以及其版本、 区域性、 公钥标记和 （可选） 及其处理器体系结构的简单名称组成。The long form of an assembly name consists of its simple name (such as "System" for the System.dll assembly) along with its version, culture, public key token, and optionally its processor architecture. 它对应于程序集的属性。It corresponds to the assembly's property. 下面的示例演示如何使用以加载.NET Framework 4 的 System.dll 程序集的名称太长。The following example illustrates the use of a long name to load the System.dll assembly for the .NET Framework 4. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/cs/load1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/vb/load1.vb#1)] 如果引发`assemblyString`指定完整的程序集名称，并与简单名称匹配的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyString` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序将无法继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则与加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换合并参数，证据。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法重载`Byte[]`从调用的程序集继承参数，以加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，而无需 SP1 中，如果你使用的版本 1.1 中方法重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`从调用程序集，继承和`Hash`和`StrongName`摘自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由 c + + 编译器去除的重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`c + + 可执行文件的地址，指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并且可以指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 但是，若要指定程序集名称的建议的方法是创建对象，并将其传递给适当的重载方法。However, the recommended way to specify an assembly name is to create an object and pass it to an appropriate overload of the method. 请参阅 。See . ## Examples 下面的示例给定其完全限定的名称，加载程序集，并列出所有包含在指定的程序集中的类型。The following example loads an assembly given its fully qualified name, and lists all the types contained in the specified assembly. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称，并与简单名称匹配的第一个程序集具有不同的版本、 区域性或公钥标记。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 加载程序将无法继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用并且仅带有属性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供任何元素 （如名称或版本） 的程序集标识，因此加载不会发生根据负载通过标识规则，如你所料从方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反，使用负载从规则加载的程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 有关使用加载源上下文的缺点的信息，请参阅方法重载或[用于程序集加载的最佳实践](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则与加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换合并参数，证据。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 当你使用方法重载`Byte[]`从调用的程序集继承参数，以加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 这适用于.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和后续版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，而无需 SP1 中，如果你使用的版本 1.1 中方法重载`Byte[]`参数加载 COFF 映像，证据结合。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`从调用程序集，继承和`Hash`和`StrongName`摘自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由 c + + 编译器去除的重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`c + + 可执行文件的地址，指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，在首次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，返回为属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果未找到该文件，用于搜索程序集。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown. 如果调用方法超过一次在同一个程序集，但与指定不同的证据，公共语言运行时不会引发因为相等性和不同的证据规范完整性不能为确定。If you call the method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一次成功的证据是使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used.

当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 在 c + + 可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 这很可能是由 c + + 编译器去除的重定位地址或`.reloc`从可执行文件的部分。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`c + + 可执行文件的地址，指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 如果在同一程序集但不同的证据指定不止一次调用此方法，公共语言运行时不会引发因为无法确定相等性和不同的证据规范的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一次成功的证据是使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并且可以指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 但是，若要指定程序集名称的建议的方法是创建对象，并将其传递给适当的重载方法。However, the recommended way to specify an assembly name is to create an object and pass it to an appropriate overload of the method. 请参阅 。See .

.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.Assembly LoadFrom(string assemblyFile) cil managed
Public Shared Function LoadFrom (assemblyFile As String) As Assembly
public: static System::Reflection::Assembly ^ LoadFrom(System::String ^ assemblyFile);

param.name: assemblyFile
param.span: 包含程序集清单的文件的名称或路径。

span.span: The name or path of the file that contains the manifest of the assembly.

summary.span: 已知程序集的文件名或路径，加载程序集。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`参数必须引用未转义符的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 此方法提供 URI 中的所有无效字符的转义的字符。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支持文件传输协议 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果为 uri，该 URI 提供`assemblyFile`是 FTP 地址，则不会加载程序集。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可能是绝对或相对于当前目录中，且程序集加载到调用方的域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 程序集可以是加载到三个上下文中的一个，也可以是没有上下文的情况下加载：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 加载上下文包含通过探测找到的程序集： 在 GAC 中，主机程序集中存储如果托管运行时，或在和的应用程序域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大多数重载都将程序集加载到此上下文中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 加载源上下文包含程序集为其用户提供不包括在搜索通过探测的目录的路径。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 都是通过路径加载的方法的示例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. - 仅限反射的上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 这些中的代码无法执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用的重载加载的程序集指定字节数组，包含一个程序集，并创建使用反射的瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载源上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集和尚未允许依赖项，该路径，以找出并加载，因为由上下文维护的路径信息。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集的加载与，以及更高版本的加载上下文中的程序集尝试加载按显示名称的同一个程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 这会反序列化程序集时。This can occur when an assembly is de-serialized. - 如果程序集的加载与，探测路径包括使用相同的标识，而另一个位置，为程序集和， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 无法加载以非特定域的程序集。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. ## Examples 下面的示例加载程序集文件名或路径。The following example loads an assembly given its file name or path. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

加载上下文包含通过探测找到的程序集： 在 GAC 中，主机程序集中存储如果托管运行时，或在和的应用程序域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大多数重载都将程序集加载到此上下文中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 加载源上下文包含程序集为其用户提供不包括在搜索通过探测的目录的路径。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 都是通过路径加载的方法的示例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. - 仅限反射的上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 这些中的代码无法执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用的重载加载的程序集指定字节数组，包含一个程序集，并创建使用反射的瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载源上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集和尚未允许依赖项，该路径，以找出并加载，因为由上下文维护的路径信息。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集的加载与，以及更高版本的加载上下文中的程序集尝试加载按显示名称的同一个程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 对程序集进行反序列化时，可能发生这种情况。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果程序集的加载与，探测路径包括使用相同的标识，而另一个位置，为程序集和， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 无法加载以非特定域的程序集。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则与加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换合并参数，证据。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果在同一程序集但不同的证据指定不止一次调用此方法，公共语言运行时不会引发因为无法确定相等性和不同的证据规范的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一次成功的证据是使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据结合。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`从调用程序集，继承和`Hash`和`StrongName`摘自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`参数必须引用未转义符的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 此方法提供 URI 中的所有无效字符的转义的字符。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支持文件传输协议 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果为 uri，该 URI 提供`assemblyFile`是 FTP 地址，则不会加载程序集。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可能是绝对或相对于当前目录中，且程序集加载到调用方的域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 程序集可以是加载到三个上下文中的一个，也可以是没有上下文的情况下加载：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 加载上下文包含通过探测找到的程序集： 在 GAC 中，主机程序集中存储如果托管运行时，或在和的应用程序域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大多数重载都将程序集加载到此上下文中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 加载源上下文包含程序集为其用户提供不包括在搜索通过探测的目录的路径。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 都是通过路径加载的方法的示例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. - 仅限反射的上下文包含与加载的程序集和方法; 这些中的代码无法执行上下文。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果用户生成或找到了程序集，它不在任何上下文中。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 这适用于使用的重载加载的程序集指定字节数组，包含一个程序集，并创建使用反射的瞬态动态程序集发出和未保存到磁盘的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 加载源上下文允许从探测中, 未包括的路径加载程序集和尚未允许依赖项，该路径，以找出并加载，因为由上下文维护的路径信息。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法具有以下缺点。The method has the following disadvantages. 请考虑改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已加载一个具有相同标识的程序集，则即使指定了不同的路径， 仍返回已加载的程序集。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果程序集的加载与，以及更高版本的加载上下文中的程序集尝试加载按显示名称的同一个程序集，加载尝试将失败。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 对程序集进行反序列化时，可能发生这种情况。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果程序集的加载与，探测路径包括使用相同的标识，而另一个位置，为程序集和， ，否则会发生其他意外的行为。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 需要对指定路径的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果本机映像存在`assemblyFile`，不使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 无法加载以非特定域的程序集。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不应用策略。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 当你使用方法没有参数，则与加载程序提供的证据加载程序集。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 当你使用方法替换合并参数，证据。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果在同一程序集但不同的证据指定不止一次调用此方法，公共语言运行时不会引发因为无法确定相等性和不同的证据规范的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一次成功的证据是使用的证据。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数加载通用对象文件格式 (COFF) 图像，证据结合。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`从调用程序集，继承和`Hash`和`StrongName`摘自 COFF 程序集。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 当你使用方法替换`Byte[]`参数和若要加载的 COFF 映像，请使用提供的证据。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 调用程序集的证据和 COFF 图像的证据将被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法从程序集加载到只反射上下文中执行代码。You cannot execute code from an assembly loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要执行代码，程序集必须加载到执行上下文，使用方法。To execute code, the assembly must be loaded into the execution context as well, using the method. 仅限反射的上下文是与其他上下文没有什么不同。The reflection-only context is no different from other contexts. 可只能通过卸载应用程序域来卸载加载到上下文的程序集。Assemblies that are loaded into the context can be unloaded only by unloading the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖项不会自动加载到只反射上下文。Dependencies are not automatically loaded into the reflection-only context. 无法从程序集加载到只反射上下文中执行代码。You cannot execute code from an assembly loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要执行代码，程序集必须加载到执行上下文，使用方法。To execute code, the assembly must be loaded into the execution context as well, using the method. 是否将特定的权限授予程序集是基于证据的。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 程序集和安全证据的合并的规则如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: > [!NOTE] > 在 c + + 中编译的可执行文件上进行反射可能会引发。Reflecting on executable files compiled in C++ might throw a . 这很可能是由于 c + + 编译器的重定位地址或.reloc 节从可执行文件所引起。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the .reloc section from your executable file. 若要保留.reloc 地址，请指定`/fixed:no`在链接时。To preserve the .reloc address, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 仅限反射的上下文是与其他上下文没有什么不同。The reflection-only context is no different from other contexts. 可只能通过卸载应用程序域来卸载加载到上下文的程序集。Assemblies that are loaded into the context can be unloaded only by unloading the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖项不会自动加载到只反射上下文。Dependencies are not automatically loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要自动加载依赖关系，处理事件和负载中的事件处理程序的依赖关系。To automatically load dependencies, handle the event and load the dependency in the event handler. 无法从已加载到只反射上下文的程序集执行代码。You cannot execute code from an assembly that has been loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要执行该代码，加载的程序集中方法。To execute the code, load the assembly with the method. `assemblyFile`参数必须引用未转义符的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 此方法提供 URI 中的所有无效字符的转义的字符。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. 为指定的路径`assemblyFile`相对于当前目录。The path specified for `assemblyFile` is relative to the current directory. 程序集被加载到调用方的域。The assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 仅限反射的上下文是与其他上下文没有什么不同。The reflection-only context is no different from other contexts. 可只能通过卸载应用程序域来卸载加载到上下文的程序集。Assemblies that are loaded into the context can be unloaded only by unloading the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加载操作系统标记为从 Web （例如，从 Internet 或 intranet 下载的临时文件） 的本地程序集。Use this method to load a local assembly that the operating system has flagged as having been loaded from the Web (for example, a temporary file that was downloaded from the Internet or intranet). 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，这样的程序集已自动加载到沙盒应用程序域。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], such assemblies were automatically loaded into a sandboxed application domain. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，它们是以完全信任方式加载。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], they are loaded with full trust. 作为使用此方法的替代方法，你可以将应用[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)应用程序配置文件中。As an alternative to using this method, you can apply the [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md) in your application configuration file. 这将导致公共语言运行时，若要还原到的安全策略[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This causes the common language runtime to revert to the security policy of the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你使用任一解决方案，你必须是确定它是否安全加载`assemblyFile`以完全信任。If you use either of these solutions, you must be certain that it is safe to load `assemblyFile` with full trust. 讨论的加载上下文，包括加载源上下文中，请参阅方法重载。For a discussion of load contexts, including the load-from context, see the method overload.
